intro: I'm Jagoba Inda, a --AGE-PLACEHOLDER-- year old Backend developer.

sections.title: Education
sections.content: I hold a Higher National Diploma in Cross-Platform Application Development and keep learning on my own through personal projects. I enjoy finding the technology that best fits each challenge, even if it’s not something traditionally taught.

sections.title: Interests
sections.content: Outside of programming, I'm interested in everything related to cybersecurity and hardware. I've assembled, disassembled, and repaired countless computers and all kinds of devices—always curious to see what’s inside.

quote: Feel free to reach out through any of the links in the contact section.
